title: The two-penny whore; in a dialogue betwixt a spend-thrift and a whore. Or, a relation of a two-penny bargain. Of a spend-thrift proffering two pence to a whore, having spent all but that on her before. The tune is, He that has the most money is the best man.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for W. Thackeray, T. Passinger, and W. Whitwood.,
